name: Embitel Technologies
description:
E-commerce is a focus area where Embitel has developed significant expertise. We offer a wide variety of e-commerce services which include strategy consulting, design, systems & technology, website management, hosting & digital marketing services 
Embitel specializes in delivering highly effective e-commerce solutions by leveraging leading platforms like Magento & hybris 
Our rigorous quality standards have enabled us to achieve CMMI Level 3 & ISO 9001:2008, ISO 27001:2005 certifications
READ MORE...

locations.address: Unit No:208 to 216, 2nd Floor, Delta Block, Sigma Soft Tech Park (SSTP), Varthur-Hobli, (Whitefield Main Road) Near Forum Value Mall, Ramagondanahalli,
